bandtour.models module

class bandtour.models.Post(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

This is a class representation of a tour Post entry.

Parameters:

  • location (str, optional) – A location for a band performance location. This is a str with maximum length of 40 characters, defaults to None

  • venue (str, optional) – The venue name where the band is performing. This is a str with maximum length of 100 characters, defaults to None

  • date (DateField, optional) – Date of band performance

  • time (Timefield, optional) – Time of band performance, defaults to None

  • tickets (str, optional) – Details on ticket availability. This is a str with maximum length of 100 characters, defaults to None
